abstract: Record earnings for Exxon, the world’s largest publicly traded oil company, have become routine as the surge of oil prices in recent years has filled its coffers.
snippet: Record earnings for Exxon, the world’s largest publicly traded oil company, have become routine as the surge of oil prices in recent years has filled its coffers.
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON  Exxon Mobil reported the best quarterly profit ever for a corporation on Thursday, beating its own record, but investors sold off shares as oil and natural gas prices resumed their recent decline.

headline.main: Exxon’s Second-Quarter Earnings Set a Record
headline.print_headline: Exxon’s Second-Quarter Earnings Set a Record

abstract: Royal Dutch Shell, Europe’s largest oil company, reported a 33 percent increase in second-quarter profit, helped by a higher oil price.
snippet: Royal Dutch Shell, Europe’s largest oil company, reported a 33 percent increase in second-quarter profit, helped by a higher oil price.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – Royal Dutch Shell, Europe's largest oil company, reported a 33 percent increase in second-quarter profit Thursday, helped by a higher oil price even as production declined.

headline.main: Shell Reports a Profit Jump Despite Reduced Production
